class.name: LogFile
class.description: A class for logging messages to a file with different log levels.

constructor.description: Constructs a LogFile object with an optional flag to print log level details.
constructor.param: Flag to enable or disable printing log level details. Defaults to false.

constructor.signature: LogFile(const String& p_path, bool p_print_level_details = false)
constructor.description: Constructs a LogFile object with a specified file path and an optional flag to print log level details.
constructor.param: The path to the log file.
Flag to enable or disable printing log level details. Defaults to false.

destructor.description: Destructs the LogFile object and removes the log callback.

method.description: Sets whether to print log level details in log messages.
method.param: Flag to enable or disable printing log level details.

method.description: Retrieves the current state of printing log level details.
method.returns: True if log level details are being printed, false otherwise.

method.signature: void log_string(Log::Level p_level, const String& p_string)
method.description: Logs a message at the specified log level.
method.param: The log level for the message.

method.description: Opens a log file with the specified path.
method.param: The path to the log file.
method.returns: Error code indicating the result of the operation (Error::OK if successful).
Error code indicating the result of the operation (Error::OK if successful).
